artifacts.content:
Dear Tim,

I wanted to bring to your attention an exciting listing at 192 Oak St, Cedar Rapids, IA that I believe would be perfect for you.

This beautiful 3 bedroom, 2 bathroom ranch-style home offers 1,450 square feet of living space and was built in 1978. It is currently listed at $185,000, which represents excellent value for this established neighborhood.

Some standout features of this charming property include:
- Updated kitchen with new appliances
- Finished basement
- Attached 2-car garage
- Fenced backyard with mature trees
- Hardwood floors throughout
- Central air and forced air heating
- Quarter-acre lot (0.25 acres)

The home is conveniently located close to schools and shopping, making it ideal for families or anyone seeking a well-maintained home in an established neighborhood.

Would you like to schedule a viewing of this property? I have several time slots available this week and would be happy to show you around.

Best regards,
John
